"What would you like to know?":
"\"Gathering\" refers to the collection of materials obtained from \"Harvesting\" and \"Fishing\".

By taking these materials to \"Franka's Cafe\", you can obtain Skill Rings and Cuisine Food."

"■ Harvesting
・By visiting a \"Harvesting Spot\", you can collect materials such as ore and minerals, as well as cuisine ingredients.
※By Harvesting, you will consume Harvest Stamina.

■ Fishing
・By visiting a \"Fishing Spot\", you can collect fish and other sea creatures required for Cuisine Food.
※By Fishing, you will consume Fishing Stamina."

"■ Stamina Recovery
\u3000\u3000・Your stamina will recover automatically over time, however you can instantly recover stamina by using Star Gems.

■ \"Master & Good\" Items
\u3000\u3000・In addition to the usual options during \"Fishing\" and \"Harvesting\", you can increase the rate of certain materials by selecting the \"Good\" or \"Master\" items."

"By using cooked food items, you can gain temporary special effects, such as the following:

Example
Forest Tomato Salad
・Vegetable acquisition and additional harvest
rates slightly increased while harvesting

Tokyo Style Burger
・Immediately recover HP

※Cooked items can be set to the subpalette"

"As you achieve Gathering Achievements, you will get recipes for new dishes, and the Culinary Shop's menu will expand.

While a food effect is active, if you use another dish, it will overwrite the previous effect."

"Combos
When you Harvest or Fish continuously, a combo will start.

As you continuously increase your combo, a chance for a Fever will also increase.

Fishing or Harvesting at a gathering spot until it's depleted will also increase your combo."

"Fever
While you are Harvesting and/or Fishing, a Fever may occur.

During a Fever, chances of getting rare material increases, as well as the amount of materials gained.
Additionally, the gathering spot will have unlimited attempts for the duration of the Fever."

"When the Fever or Combo ends, you will be awarded EXP based on the number of combos achieved.
※There is a limit to how much EXP is awarded."

"When certain conditions are met while Harvesting and/or Fishing, you will obtain Achievements.

Upon obtaining an Achievement, a rewarded may be obtained.

Completing an Achievement will allow you to obtain higher tiered Achievements as well."

"As you unlock more and more achievements, your gathering levels increase.

As your gathering levels increase, your fever time increases as well. You can also obtain other rewards too!

Additionally, when you've gained a level in Harvesting or Fishing, your stamina pool is refilled."
